sentences.sContent: It was clear that one massive Allied offensive would overwhelm the weakened enemy.
sentences.sCn: 显然同盟国一次大规模的进攻就会彻底击败已被削弱的敌军。

remMethod.val: over(在…上) + whelm(淹没) → 压倒； 淹没

trans.tranCn: 战胜， 征服， 压倒； 淹没， 席卷
trans.tranOther: if water overwhelms an area of land, it covers it completely and suddenly
